attributes.action: Cut the cost of fuel by 50 pence a litre
attributes.additional_details: cost of living is going up and our wages don't fit the cost of petrol prices caused by government tax on fuel
attributes.background: Help the working people by cutting the cost of fuel to help us survive, as the cost of living is going up we don't think it's fair that we are all struggling with travelling to our work places,

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting road fuel prices. 

You might like to sign this petition calling for a reduction in taxes on fuel

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
